pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ali cloud disk WebDAV service, the main use scenario is to cooperate with client apps that support the WebDAV protocol, such as Infuse, nPlayer, etc. to directly watch cloud disk video content on TV, and support client apps to directly obtain files from Alibaba cloud disk to play without running The server transfer of this application supports uploading files, but limited by the WebDAV protocol, it does not support instant file transfer.
阿里云盘 WebDAV 服务，主要使用场景为配合支持 WebDAV 协议的客户端 App 如 Infuse、nPlayer 等实现在电视上直接观看云盘视频内容， 支持客户端 App 直接从阿里云盘获取文件播放而不经过运行本应用的服务器中转, 支持上传文件，但受限于 WebDAV 协议不支持文件秒传。
